verbs.description: [ARG0: A group of 27 senators , both Republican and Democrat ,] [V: sent] [ARG1: a letter] [ARG2: to top Trump officials] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [C-ARG1: requesting caution during trade negotiations with China] . The lawmakers specifically warned against loosening export controls on key US technologies since doing so could help boost China 's military .
